headline.main: China Feb Data Seen Showing Further Slump in Trade, Smaller Drop in FX Reserves-Reuters Poll
headline.print_headline: China Feb Data Seen Showing Further Slump in Trade, Smaller Drop in FX Reserves-Reuters Poll

docs.snippet: A raft of China data in coming weeks is expected to point to a further loss of momentum in the world's second-largest economy, reinforcing expectations Beijing will unveil more support measures in coming months, a Reuters' poll of economists showe...
docs.lead_paragraph: A raft of China data in coming weeks is expected to point to a further loss of momentum in the world's second-largest economy, reinforcing expectations Beijing will unveil more support measures in coming months, a Reuters' poll of economists showed.

headline.main: Pentagon Chief Says 40 LCS Ships 'Enough' for U.S. Navy
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Chief Says 40 LCS Ships 'Enough' for U.S. Navy

docs.snippet: U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter on Thursday defended the Pentagon's decision to buy just 40 Littoral Combat Ships instead of the 52 originally planned, saying the money saved would allow the Navy to buy more missiles and undersea technology....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter on Thursday defended the Pentagon's decision to buy just 40 Littoral Combat Ships instead of the 52 originally planned, saying the money saved would allow the Navy to buy more missiles and undersea technology.

headline.main: Talbot, Edmonton Blank Flyers for Third Straight Win
headline.print_headline: Talbot, Edmonton Blank Flyers for Third Straight Win

docs.snippet: Taylor Hall, Nail Yakupov, Patrick Maroon and Lauri Korpikoski all scored, and Cam Talbot made 35 saves to lead Edmonton to its third straight victory, 4-0 over the Philadelphia Flyers on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Taylor Hall, Nail Yakupov, Patrick Maroon and Lauri Korpikoski all scored, and Cam Talbot made 35 saves to lead Edmonton to its third straight victory, 4-0 over the Philadelphia Flyers on Thursday night.

headline.main: Larsson Scores Go-Ahead Goal in Sabres' 6-3 Win Over Flames
headline.print_headline: Larsson Scores Go-Ahead Goal in Sabres' 6-3 Win Over Flames

docs.snippet: Johan Larsson scored the go-ahead goal with 9:31 left and Marcus Foligno had a goal and two assists in the Buffalo Sabres' 6-3 win over the Calgary Flames on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Johan Larsson scored the go-ahead goal with 9:31 left and Marcus Foligno had a goal and two assists in the Buffalo Sabres' 6-3 win over the Calgary Flames on Thursday night.

headline.main: Crosby, Malkin Help Pens Frustrate Lundqvist, Rangers
headline.print_headline: Crosby, Malkin Help Pens Frustrate Lundqvist, Rangers

docs.snippet: Sidney Crosby, Evgeni Malkin and Patric Hornqvist each scored in the final 2:13 of the second period, leading the Pittsburgh Penguins to a 4-1 victory over the New York Rangers on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby, Evgeni Malkin and Patric Hornqvist each scored in the final 2:13 of the second period, leading the Pittsburgh Penguins to a 4-1 victory over the New York Rangers on Thursday night.
